title: [破空]原版TNT加强模组
author: pokongA.A
txt_content:
hi，我是破空，可以说我是第一次发帖子
这次的帖子主题：更多TNT
其实，这些tnt，都是普通的，只是强化了威力
原版模组
确认版本1.8以上

TNT炸药牌行榜
bomb<normal<Lightning<bigtnt<nuclearbomb
只要随机一个怪物蛋命名成这些名字就行了
而且，如果你发现有时候失败的话，请把这些命令方块一个个打掉
由于我技术渣
不知道怎么弄删除的牌子
请见谅
下次会改进
命令：/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~ ~ ~1 ~ ~-21 ~1 redstone_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~ ~2 ~ ~ ~-22 ~1 air},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~3 ~-9 ~ {Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~ ~ ~-1 ~6 ~ ~1 bedrock}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~4 ~-15 ~-1 {Block:bedrock,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:execute @e[name=Lightning] ~ ~ ~ summon Creeper ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:0,ExplosionRadius:14b}},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~5 ~-14 ~-1 {Block:bedrock,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:execute @e[name=bigtnt] ~ ~ ~ summon Creeper ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:0,ExplosionRadius:17b}},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~6 ~-13 ~-1 {Block:bedrock,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:execute @e[name=bomb] ~ ~ ~ summon Creeper ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:0,ExplosionRadius:5b}},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~7 ~-12 ~-1 {Block:bedrock,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:say 命令使用:把随机一个怪物蛋},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~8 ~-11 ~-1 {Block:bedrock,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:say 命名为 normal},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~9 ~-10 ~-1 {Block:bedrock,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:say 命名为 nuclearbomb},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~4 ~-10 ~1 {Block:bedrock,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:execute @e[name=normal] ~ ~ ~ summon Creeper ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:0,ExplosionRadius:6b}},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~5 ~-9 ~1 {Block:bedrock,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:execute @e[name=nuclearbomb] ~ ~ ~ summon Creeper ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:0,ExplosionRadius:50b}},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~6 ~-8 ~1 {Block:bedrock,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:execute @e[name=Lightning] ~ ~ ~ summon LightningBlot},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~7 ~-7 ~1 {Block:bedrock,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:say 命名为 Lightning},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~8 ~-6 ~1 {Block:bedrock,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:say 命名为 bigtnt},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~9 ~-5 ~1 {Block:bedrock,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:say 命名为 bomb},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:gamerule commandBlockOutput false},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~3 ~-4 ~ ~9 ~-4 ~ redstone_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~3 ~-3 ~-1 command_block 0 replace {Command:fill ~ ~ ~1 ~6 ~0 ~1 stone 0 replace redstone_block}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~3 ~-2 ~1 command_block 0 replace {Command:fill ~ ~ ~-1 ~6 ~0 ~-1 redstone_block 0 replace stone}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~2 ~-1 ~-2 ~10 ~-1 ~2 stained_glass 10 replace bedrock},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~3 ~ ~-1 ~9 ~3 ~1 air 0 replace bedrock},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~2 ~ ~-2 ~10 ~2 ~2 bedrock},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:stone,Time:1}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}如果复制不了
请进入这个网址:http://pan.baidu.com/disk/home#category/type=4
如果地址用不了告诉我

replies.author: (兜兜）
replies.txt_content: 人来了，感觉好厉害 ，就是有点看不懂

replies.author: pokongA.A
replies.txt_content:
(兜兜） 发表于 2015-12-6 00:11
人来了，感觉好厉害 ，就是有点看不懂
毕竟第一次发帖
不怎么好{:10_512:}

replies.author: (兜兜）
replies.txt_content:
pokongA.A 发表于 2015-12-6 00:17
毕竟第一次发帖
不怎么好
我手机登录（还电脑版）着不方便看，抱歉啊

replies.author: Java我恨你
replies.txt_content: 其实删除牌子用的就是fill

replies.author: 840196733mw
replies.txt_content:
求图，没图不开心
懒得试了（懒癌晚期）
